title: Dear Riot
body: Hey am having trouble purchase a skin of skt Ryze but i have the money but it not letting me unlocking the skin and also you should fix that when we look at skin it shows the prices on them so far  am not impress of the new client thing i miss the old classic client never do me wrong so plz fix the problem

replies.body: I'm not sure I'm totally understanding the issue, but I want to help!  Are you getting any errors trying to unlock Ryze's skin, or does it say Not Implemented?  Make sure that you're trying to unlock his skin through the Store Panel, and not Collections.  Collections doesn't have unlocked available yet.  Let me know!
